subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Fans were given the chance to salute Peyton Manning for his years of service in his first game in Indianapolis since the Colts let him go, but the rest of the night belonged to Andrew Luck.
snippet: Fans were given the chance to salute Peyton Manning for his years of service in his first game in Indianapolis since the Colts let him go, but the rest of the night belonged to Andrew Luck.
